bill_title: limit gifts to directors or employees of certain government districts.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to limit gifts to directors or employees of certain government districts. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added: 34A-16-7.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a regional recycling and waste management district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district commissioner or employee of the district. Section 2. That a NEW SECTION be added: 46A-3D-1.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a water development district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district director or employee of the district. Section 3. That a NEW SECTION be added: 46A-18-34.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a water project district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district director or employee of the district. Section 4. That a NEW SECTION be added: 46A-4-47.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year an irrigation district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district director or employee of the district. Section 5. That a NEW SECTION be added: 46A-9-33.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a water user district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district director or employee of the district. Section 6. That a NEW SECTION be added: 46A-14-42.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a watershed district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district manager or employee of the district. Section 7. That a NEW SECTION be added: 34A-5-27.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a sanitary district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district trustee or employee of the district. Section 8. That a NEW SECTION be added: 38-8-47.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a conservation district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any conservation district supervisor or employee of the district. Section 9. That a NEW SECTION be added: 40-37-9.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a predator control district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district director or employee of the district. Section 10. That a NEW SECTION be added: 34-11A-14.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year an ambulance district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district director or employee of the district. Section 11. That a NEW SECTION be added: 34-31A-15.2. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a rural fire protection district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district director or employee of the district. Section 12. That a NEW SECTION be added: 34-10-33. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a public hospital district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district trustee or employee of the district. Section 13. That a NEW SECTION be added: 49-17A-10.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a regional railroad authority may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district commissioner or employee of the district. Section 14. That a NEW SECTION be added: 49-36-16.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a consumer power district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district director or employee of the district. Section 15. That a NEW SECTION be added: 31-12A-21.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year a road district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district trustee or employee of the district. Section 16. That a NEW SECTION be added: 7-25A-20.1. Limitation on gifts. During a calendar year an improvement district may not give gifts using district funds having a cumulative value of one hundred dollars or more to any district supervisor or employee of the district.
